One covered parking space.', 'BRAND NEW TILE FLOORING THROUGHOUT UNIT!', 'Front living room with patio access.', 'Dining area with a ceiling fan next to the kitchen.', 'Master bedroom has a long closet.', 'Full bathroom.', 'Has an exterior patio area!', 'Has a community pool and tennis courts!', 'Section 8 is welcome!', 'All appliances included!', 'Pets allowed.', 'No smoking.', 'For more information on this property or to set up an appointment to view it, please call Chris at', 'show contact info', '.', 'Please reference the street name 1455 KATIE AVE.', '#P17 when calling!', '~First United Management Group, LLC.~', 'Located at Maryland Pkwy and Flamingo.', 'License # S.0169212']
